title: Consumed
description: Consumed, the second book of The Cassano Series, is packed full of suspense and takes the heat to a whole new level. Victoria must sort out her feelings for Reggie and Adrian. How will Reggie handle working with her after he hears the truth? When Victoria’s impulsivity causes more trouble for her career, Adrian teaches her how to control that brazen behavior by encouraging her to trust him in unforeseen ways. Victoria soon discovers the sizzling acts that go on behind closed doors at Hotel Submission and Casino. More than one Cassano brother finds love, and consequential secrets are revealed. What will Adrian’s brother, Simon, do when he uncovers that Victoria is a cop? Will Victoria forgive once she realizes she has been deceived, as well?Concealment must be read prior to reading Consumed. This novel is for a mature audience due to harsh language and descriptive sexual scenes.
author: Scarlet Wolfe
